object.creator: Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci
object.title: Mona Lisa
object.description: The best known, the most visited, the most written about, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world.

object.title: David
object.creator: Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni
object.description: David is a masterpiece of Renaissance sculpture created in marble. David is a 5.17-metre (17.0 ft) marble statue of the Biblical hero David, a favoured subject in the art of Florence.

object.creator: Kazimir Malevich
object.title: Black Square
object.description: This work is frequently invoked by critics, historians, curators, and artists as the "zero point of painting".
